formalpara.title: Summary
formalpara.para: Edit the properties of a resource.

step.para: Use the resource tabs, tree mode, or the search function to find and select the resource in the results list.
Click Edit to open the Edit window.
Change the necessary properties and click OK.

formalpara.title: Result
formalpara.para: The new properties are saved to the resource. The Edit window will not close if a property field is invalid.
